revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Pitcher | class = Pitcher | game = Strife | doomednum = 188 | convid = 275 }}[[Classes]]: Pitcher
{{desc}}In Strife1.wad, the sprite is actually named VASEB0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Pitcher { {{Property|Radius}} 12 {{Property|Height}} 32 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: VAZE B -1 Stop } }
